text: Carla Diane Hayden (born August 10, 1952) is an American librarian. She is the 14th and current Librarian of Congress since 2016. Hayden is the first woman and the first African American to hold the post. She is the first professional librarian appointed to the post in over 60 years. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Florida Category:People from Tallahassee, Florida Category:Librarians
title: Carla Hayden
